languages.text: "Я осуждаю ваши практики... Но пока не буду запрещать их".
"I disapprove of your practices... but I am not going to ban them. For now."
languages.original_text: "Я осуждаю ваши практики... Но пока не буду запрещать их".

traits.locale_text: "I disapprove of your practices... but I am not going to ban them. For now."
"I disapprove of your practices... but I am not going to ban them. For now."
"I disapprove of your practices... but I am not going to ban them. For now."
"I disapprove of your practices... but I am not going to ban them. For now."
"I disapprove of your practices... but I am not going to ban them. For now."
"I disapprove of your practices... but I am not going to ban them. For now."

languages.text: «No apruebo sus prácticas... pero no voy a prohibirlas. Por ahora».
languages.original_text: "I disapprove of your practices... but I am not going to ban them. For now."

traits.locale_text: «No apruebo sus prácticas... pero no voy a prohibirlas. Por ahora».

languages.text: 「あなたの行いには賛成できない…でも、それらを禁じる事もしない。とりあえず今は」
languages.original_text: "I disapprove of your practices... but I am not going to ban them. For now."

traits.locale_text: 「あなたの行いには賛成できない…でも、それらを禁じる事もしない。とりあえず今は」

languages.text: “我并不赞成你们的做法……但我暂时还不打算颁布禁令。”
languages.original_text: "I disapprove of your practices... but I am not going to ban them. For now."

traits.locale_text: “我并不赞成你们的做法……但我暂时还不打算颁布禁令。”

languages.text: "Ich heiße Eure Methoden nicht gut ... aber ich werde sie auch nicht verbieten. Vorerst."
languages.original_text: "I disapprove of your practices... but I am not going to ban them. For now."

traits.locale_text: "Ich heiße Eure Methoden nicht gut ... aber ich werde sie auch nicht verbieten. Vorerst."

languages.text: « Je désapprouve vos pratiques... mais je ne les interdirai pas. Pas pour l'instant, en tout cas. »
languages.original_text: "I disapprove of your practices... but I am not going to ban them. For now."

traits.locale_text: « Je désapprouve vos pratiques... mais je ne les interdirai pas. Pas pour l'instant, en tout cas. »

languages.original_text: "I disapprove of your practices... but I am not going to ban them. For now."
